response.overview: Evidence collected by the NAVS inside British laboratories provides the widest and most accurate picture available of life and death for lab animals. NAVS were the first organization to expose contract testing on animals; to film primates in brain research; to expose the overbreeding of animals; and the only organization whose investigative work has led to a laboratory licence to experiment being revoked. Unlock the Labs contains footage from these investigations.
response.title: Unlock the Labs
